thread.title: Commonwealth CEO Inducted Into NAPW’s VIP Woman of the Year Circle
thread.title_full: Commonwealth CEO Inducted Into NAPW’s VIP Woman of the Year Circle

title: Commonwealth CEO Inducted Into NAPW’s VIP Woman of the Year Circle
text:
Commonwealth CEO Inducted Into NAPW’s VIP Woman of the Year Circle July 28, 2015, 07:00 AM Related: Commonwealth Capital , Kimberly Springsteen-Abbott 
Commonwealth Capital Corp., announced today that Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Kimberly A. Springsteen-Abbott has been honored as a 2015-2016 inductee into the National Association of Professional Women's (NAPW) VIP Woman of the Year Circle."I am honored to be recognized as a Woman of the Year by the National Association of Professional Women," said Springsteen-Abbott. "Throughout my career I have worked tirelessly to provide my clients and investors with the highest level of professionalism and service possible. To have these efforts recognized and rewarded with this honor is extremely gratifying and I am very thankful."The NAPW is a leading networking organization exclusively for professional women that has more than 700,000 members and in excess of 200 local chapters.Springsteen-Abbott is a member of the Equipment Leasing and Finance Association, Financial Planners Association and the National Association of Equipment Leasing Brokers. She previously served on the board of directors of the Investment Program Association. Springsteen-Abbott holds Series 7, 63 and 39 FINRA licenses. Today's Other News
